I also have PCOS and ended up having to work with a fertility specialist.  I was on 1000 mg/day.  I had u/s at 7 weeks and he told me to cut back to 500 mg/day for one week and then be done.  So, as of today, I am not going to take it.  However, I have an appointment with my regular OB's nurse next week with a 2nd u/s and then with my OB in two weeks.  I will definitely follow what your OB says.  I would call and tell how many different directions you were told and ask what is the best one to follow.  I think some of it might have to do with what the chances of gestational diabetes is and what your levels were to begin with.  I also think that every OB is different and they have reasons for giving those directions.Good luck!
